content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE 160: Ok vs. Lee 2*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on August 26, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background A [ONE Lightweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Lightweight_World_Championship) rematch between current champion [Ok Rae-yoon](/wiki/Ok_Rae-yoon) and former champion (also [2019 ONE Lightweight World Grand Prix Champion](/wiki/2019_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Lightweight_Grand_Prix_bracket)) [Christian Lee](/wiki/Christian_Lee_(fighter)) headlined the event. The pairing previously met at ONE: Revolution in September 2021 where Ok defeated Lee by unanimous decision. A [ONE Featherweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Featherweight_World_Championship) bout between current champion [Thanh Le](/wiki/Thanh_Le) and [Tang Kai](/wiki/Tang_Kai) at the co-main event. The event featured a semi-final of the [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Grand Prix Tournament](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship#ONE_Flyweight_Grand_Prix_bracket) between [Superlek Kiatmoo9](/wiki/Superlek_Kiatmuu9) and former [ONE Flyweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Flyweight_World_Championship_3) challenger [Walter Goncalves](/wiki/Walter_Goncalves). The winner will advance to the World Grand Prix Tournament final. However, the bout was pushed back to ONE on Prime Video: Moraes vs. Johnson 2 for to compete together in tournaments. A Welterweight bout between former [ONE Welterweight World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Welterweight_World_Championship) Zebaztian Kadestam and former [ONE Lightweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Lightweight_World_Championship) challenger Iuri Lapicus was expected to take place at the event. However, on August 10, it was announced that the bout will be moved to ONE on Prime Video 1: Moraes vs. Johnson 2. A lightweight submission grappling bout between Valdir Rodrigues and Renato Canuto was expected to take place at the event. However, Rodrigues withdraw due to undisclosed reason and was replaced by [Tommy Langaker](/wiki/Tommy_Langaker). ## Results Main card (YouTube / Watch ONE)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesLightweight[Christian Lee](/wiki/Christian_Lee_(fighter))def.[Ok Rae-yoon](/wiki/Ok_Rae-yoon) (c)TKO (knees)21:00[a]Featherweight[Tang Kai](/wiki/Tang_Kai)def.[Thanh Le](/wiki/Thanh_Le) (c)Decision (unanimous)55:00[b]Bantamweight Muay Thai[Saemapetch Fairtex](/wiki/Saemapetch_Fairtex)def.[Rittewada Petchyindee](/wiki/Rittewada_Petchyindee_Academy)KO (punch)21:35FeatherweightKeanu Subbadef.Amir KhanKO (punches)13:29HeavyweightMartin Baturvs.Paul ElliottNo Contest (overturned)13:38[c]Lightweight Submission Grappling[Tommy Langaker](/wiki/Tommy_Langaker)def.Renato CanutoDecision (unanimous)110:00BantamweightKantharaj Agasadef.Thales NakassuTKO (punches)12:55 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night**: **Christian Lee, Saemapetch Fairtex, Martin Batur** and **Tommy Langaker** ## Aftermath On September 27, 2022, it was announced that Martin Batur's technical knockout against Paul Elliott was overturned by International Doping Tests & Management (IDTM) after Batur has tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug (PED) and he tested positive for an [Anabolic steroid](/wiki/Anabolic_steroid), which is a banned substance according to the [World Anti-Doping Agency](/wiki/World_Anti-Doping_Agency) (WADA). He has been banned by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) for a year. - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE 160
